Name: Hot Tub
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.
Review: Basically, a French Martini with bubbles.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2004 at Teatro in Boston, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Hot Tub contains 161 calories
